English.alert_about:
Run Shortcut gives you quick access to your shortcuts from the Notification Center Widget.

You can also run your shortcuts through NoteCuts, allowing it to continue working in the background.
English.alert_update_none: You are currently running the latest version of Run Shortcut.
English.alert_updateShortcuts:
A cached list of your shortcuts will now be generated so you can search using your voice or by text input.

Note: If you have a lot of shortcuts installed on your iOS device, this process may take several seconds.
English.alert_welcome:
Run Shortcut gives you quick access to your shortcuts from the Notification Center Widget.

You can also run your shortcuts through NoteCuts, allowing it to continue working in the background
English.alert_welcome_2:
A cached list of your shortcuts will now be generated so you can search using your voice or by text input.

Note: If you have a lot of shortcuts installed on your iOS device, this process may take several seconds.
English.alert_welcome_3:
You can search for shortcuts using keywords. Separate them with new lines. You can also speak or enter the following commands to perform actions within the widget:

• Show All: Show all shortcuts

• Change Mode: Change the Run Mode

• Open Settings: Adjust settings for this shortcut

• With Parameters: Dictate or enter parameters to send to the shortcut

• From the Clipboard: When used with parameters, sends the clipboard as input to the shortcut

• In the Background: Runs the shortcut through NoteCuts
English.alert_welcome_4:
NoteCuts runs shortcuts automatically on iOS devices by monitoring for shortcut commands within shared Apple Notes notes, Dropbox files, and Evernote notes.

NoteCuts works with web trigggering services such as IFTTT and Zapier to automatically run shortcuts in the background.

Now, with Run Shortcut, you can still run your shortcuts at the same time NoteCuts is running. If you use Run Shortcut Widget with NoteCuts, set the Run Mode to use NoteCuts or Ask When Run.
English.alert_welcome_4_title: Using Run Shortcut Widget with NoteCuts
English.alert_welcome_5: What would you like to do next?
English.error_notecuts_404: The NoteCut is not defined or could not be found.
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet to check for updates.
English.error_shortcuts_404: Shortcut Map Dictionary could not be found. Run Update Shortcuts from Run Shortcut Admin.
English.prompt_dictationLanguage: Choose the language to use when searching for shortcuts using dictation.
English.prompt_maxPerPage: Choose the number of search results to display per page.
English.prompt_notecut: Select a local NoteCut that will be used to launch shortcuts.
English.prompt_runMode: Select the action you want to occur when you select a shortcut.
English.prompt_launchSearchType:
Choose search style when launching Run Shortcut.

• Dictation: Speak the name of the shortcut you want to run.

This option allows Run Shortcut to work in Notification Center.

You can say `open settings` to view the Settings page.

• Text: Type part of the name of the shortcut you want to run. This open must open the Shortcuts app to display the text input dialog.

• Show All Shortcuts: Displays a list of all shortcuts installed on your iOS device.
English.prompt_reset_settings: Are you sure you want to reset Run Shortcut settings on this device?
English.prompt_sort: Choose sort order when displaying shortcuts.
